response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, offering significant benefits and advantages. To secure this opportunity, I am extending an initial offer of $12,000. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.", "product_price": 12000}
